name: Ho Chi Minh City canal and sunset view tour - a spectacular dawn trip
description:
Explore the waterways in and around Saigon to see what life is like for people living and working in this amazingly diverse and rapidly developing city. In minutes, leave the urban metropolis behind to emerge along scenic jungle-fringed canals and minor tributaries where locals still preserve traditional ways of life not far from the city center. 
A light dinner of Vietnamese dishes will be served during your two-hour tour. Return to Saigon just after sunset to see the city‘s ever-changing skyline and bridges lit up spectacularly at night.
